transcripts.transcript_text: Speaker A: Yes, hello, yes, yeah. Am I speaking with Patrick here? Am I speaking with Patrick here? Muhira Patrick. Yes, yes, hello. Hello, Patrick, this side. Calling you from Ambit student response is regarding your student student accommodation for University College. Yes, yes, Patrick, I just wanted to confirm which property would you like to proceed? Is it Londones Lady Margaret House or I.Q. tucknell House? Which one do you wish to proceed? I'm not really here in this very way. If it is because of network, I don't know, Patrick. Yes, yes, we can connect on WhatsApp. WhatsApp. WhatsApp.

properties_discussed.preferences_expressed: Bronze Ensuite room preferred; no deposit needed; bedding and kitchen packs not included
properties_discussed.offers_made: Offer for Bronze Ensuite at 260/week, total 13,455 including fees; payment plan in 4 instalments proposed by agent

next_steps.immediate_actions: Student to make first instalment payment as per revised plan to enable check-in
next_steps.pending_items: Confirmation of payment receipt; possible university letter to support payment delay
next_steps.follow_up_required: Agent to confirm receipt of payment and check-in eligibility; monitor student arrival and payment progress
next_steps.timeline: Move-in date: 6 September 2025; student arrival planned 22 September 2025; payment instalments scheduled between 25 Sept 2025 and 1 March 2026

agent_notes.student_tone: Polite, appreciative, and cooperative; requests flexibility due to scholarship dependency
agent_notes.urgency_level: Moderate; student requests early check-in due to travel plans and accommodation needs
agent_notes.complexity: Moderate; involves negotiation on payment schedule and check-in conditions
agent_notes.special_considerations: Student depends solely on scholarship funds; international bank transfer delays possible; check-in conditional on payment receipt
